sentences.sContent: She ran back to the classroom to get her schoolbag.
sentences.sContent_eng: She ran back to the classroom to get her schoolbag.

sentences.sContent: I was straightening my schoolbag when you phoned me.
sentences.sContent_eng: I was straightening my schoolbag when you phoned me.
sentences.sCn: 你给我打电话时，我正在整理书包。

sentences.sContent: Mom, could you buy me a new green leather schoolbag?
sentences.sContent_eng: Mom, could you buy me a new green leather schoolbag?
sentences.sCn: 妈妈，你能为我买一个新的绿色皮书包吗？

trans.tranOther: A schoolbag is a bag that children use to carry books and other things to and from school
